abilities.name: Ground Slam
about: Slams the ground, creating wave that travel forwards and damage enemies

abilities.name: Hook
about: Throws out a chain, pulling encounter to the terrain hit dealing damage in an area on it's path

abilities.name: Charged Slam
about: Slams the ground, creating empowered wave that travel forwards and damage enemies

abilities.name: Charged Hook
about: Throws out an empowered chain, pulling encounter to the terrain hit dealing damage in an area on it's path

abilities.name: Charged Aerial Slam
about: Lifts to the air while being untargettable
Strikes enemy foes down with an empowered powerful blow

abilities.name: Summon Books
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter

abilities.name: Books Discharge
about: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast

abilities.name: Discharge
about: Discharges all the encounter's charges to deal lightning damage to all nearby enemies

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
about: Fires a slow-moving projectile that periodically damages enemies in an area around it with bolts of lightning

abilities.name: Aerial Barrage
about: Lifts to the air while being untargettable
